title: Smart Data Model - TelematicsDevice
description: This telematics data model is structured to support various applications in the automotive and transportation sectors, enabling efficient data collection and analysis for vehicle monitoring, navigation, and diagnostics.

type.description: Property. NGSI entity type. It has to be TelematicsDevice

UUID.description: Property. Unique identifier for the telematics data.

messageReceivedTime.description: Property. Time when the message was received.

direction.description: Property. Direction of vehicle movement in degrees.

engineStatus.description: Property. Current status of the engine (e.g., 1 for on and 0 for off).

z.description: Property. Altitude or elevation above sea level.

velocity.description: Property. Current speed of the vehicle.

outerVoltage.description: Property. Voltage measured outside the vehicle.

gpsSignalStrength.description: Property. Strength of the GPS signal.

satellites.description: Property. Number of satellites used for GPS signal.

receivedHash.description: Property. Hash value received for data validation.
